entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. 40 percent chance of wet flurries over higher terrain in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:15 PM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023
